mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT b.c_id AS id, c.name AS name FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill b LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_clients c ON b.c_id = c.c_id WHERE b.billstates = 10
AND b.s_id = #{sId}

SELECT r.billid AS orderId, r.billnumber AS billNo, r.e_id AS buyerId, e.name AS buyer, c.name AS unitName FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill r LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_employees e ON r.e_id = e.e_id LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_clients c ON c.c_id = r.c_id WHERE r.c_id = #{unitId} AND r.billstates = 10 AND r.pdastates != 2

SELECT r.billid AS orderId, r.billnumber AS billNo, r.e_id AS buyerId, e.name AS buyer FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill r LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_employees e ON r.e_id = e.e_id WHERE r.billid = #{orderId} AND r.pdastates = 0

SELECT d.smb_id AS id, d.original_id AS originalId, b.billnumber AS billNo, d.TaxPrice AS retailPrice, d.Yqty AS amount, d.EligibleQty AS quantity, c.name AS manufacturer, d.Batchno AS lotNo, p.name AS goodsName, p.standard AS specification, CONVERT(VARCHAR (100), d.Validdate, 23) AS validityDate, CONVERT(VARCHAR (100), p.makearea, 23) AS produceArea, p.barcode AS barcode, d.DealStates AS status, p.WholeUnitName AS zhUnit, p.unit1Name AS lhUnit, p.WholeRate AS rate FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill_D d LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill b ON b.billid = d.bill_id LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_Products p ON d.p_id = p.p_id LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_clients c ON c.c_id = d.Supplier_id WHERE d.bill_id = #{orderId} AND d.pdastates = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill_D (bill_id, p_id, MakeDate, Validdate, Batchno, Yqty, EligibleQty, TaxPrice, TaxTotal, CostPrice, CostTotal, S_id, Location_id, Supplier_id, DealStates, pdastates, original_id, rownumber, wctime, loginid) VALUES (#{item.bill_id}, #{item.p_id}, #{item.MakeDate}, #{item.Validdate}, #{item.Batchno}, #{item.Yqty}, #{item.EligibleQty}, #{item.TaxPrice}, #{item.TaxTotal}, #{item.CostPrice}, #{item.CostTotal}, #{item.S_id}, #{item.Location_id}, #{item.Supplier_id}, #{item.DealStates}, #{item.pdastates}, #{item.original_id}, #{item.rownumber}, getdate(), #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT d.Batchno AS lotNo, CONVERT(VARCHAR (100), d.Validdate, 23) AS validityDate, d.TaxPrice AS price, d.rownumber AS serialNo, d.WholeQty AS zhAmount, p.WholeUnitName AS zhUnit, d.retailQty AS lhAmount, p.unit1Name AS lhUnit, p.WholeRate AS rate FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill_D d LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_Products p ON d.p_id = p.p_id WHERE d.DealStates = 1 AND d.original_id = #{id}

SELECT b.billid AS id, b.billnumber AS documentNo, CONVERT(VARCHAR (100), b.pdaInTime, 23) AS documentDate, 1 AS type, '验收单' AS typeDescription, CASE b.billstates WHEN 10 THEN '验收中' WHEN 13 THEN '已验收' ELSE '' END AS status FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill b WHERE b.pdastates = 1
AND b.s_id=#{sId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill_D (bill_id, p_id, MakeDate, Validdate, Batchno, Yqty, EligibleQty, TaxPrice, TaxTotal, CostPrice, CostTotal, S_id, Location_id, Supplier_id, DealStates, pdastates) SELECT d.bill_id, d.p_id, d.MakeDate, #{date}, #{lotNo}, d.Yqty, #{amount}, #{price}, d.TaxTotal, d.CostPrice, d.CostTotal, d.S_id, d.Location_id, d.Supplier_id, 1, d.pdastates FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill_D d WHERE d.smb_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 bill_id, p_id, MakeDate, Validdate, Batchno, Yqty, EligibleQty, TaxPrice, TaxTotal, CostPrice, CostTotal, S_id, Location_id, Supplier_id, DealStates, pdastates, original_id FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill_D WHERE original_id = #{id}
